articles.content: Manchester City star Erling Haaland has struggled against the Premier League's top six teams away from Etihad Stadium but there were no signs of those issues on Wednesday evening. City's talisman cau… [+3338 chars]

articles.title: Hughes spoils Tassie party as NSW grab confidence-booster | Marsh One-Day Cup 2022-23 - cricket.com.au
